original_text: The men of Ephraim were called to arms, and they crossed to Zaphon and said to Jephthah, “Why did you cross over to fight against the Ammonites and did not call us to go with you? We will burn your house over you with fire.”
korean_text: 에브라임 사람들이 모여 북쪽으로 가서 입다에게 이르되 네가 암몬 자손과 싸우러 건너갈 때에 어찌하여 우리를 불러 너와 함께 가게 하지 아니하였느냐 우리가 반드시 너와 네 집을 불사르리라 하니

sentences.original_text: The men of Ephraim were called to arms
Why did you cross over to fight against the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 당신은 암몬 사람들과 싸우러 건너갔습니까

sentences.original_text: and did not call us to go with you?
We will burn your house over you with fire.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 불로 당신의 집을 당신 위에 태워버리겠습니다.
